name: Courtyard by Marriott Greensboro

reviews.text: We needed a one night stay while visiting the area. This hotel was clean, comfortable, quiet and had a good security system. It had a good location. It was close to the interstate, close to colleges and shopping. We will definitely recommend this to anyone.
reviews.title: exellent stay
great hotel near furniture shopping etc
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed here in July 2006 when we came down to do some serious furniture shopping. Many furniture places were in nearby Highpoint but Greensboro is so much nicer an area to stay in. Near restaurants, shopping and minutes away from sll the great furniture shopping. We had a free breakfast buffet included which was great, they always had free fresh coffee in lobby and staff very friendly. Rooms nice size with view of courtyard and nice pool. Lots of families here with small children, teenagers and older couples as well. Would definitely stay here again.

reviews.title: A Courtyard is a courtyard
reviews.text: Its like most Courtyards. Clean, ordinary and easy access from the freeway. Front desk personnel was friendly and helpful.
Easy access from I 40. Acceptable pool. Room was clean and acceptable for a nice motel (i.e., comfort inn, motel 6, etc.).However, price was very high ($82.00 from priceline).

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Greensboro Hotel Greensboro
description: Courtyard Greensboro features our new lobby with inviting spaces to work or relax in, free Wi-Fi and easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard. The Bistro provides guests with healthy food & beverage offerings in the morning and evening dinner service with cocktails. Our hotel is close to Greensboro Coliseum Complex, Four Seasons Town Center, UNC Greensboro and Greensboro Piedmont Triad International Airport. Business travelers will enjoy our proximity to Daimler Chrysler, Guilford Mills, Syngenta and Xpedx International Paper. We offer a well-equipped fitness center and outdoor pool, a 24-hour business center, and boarding pass printing service.
